about.title: About me
about.paragraph: Hello, I'm Flynn Payne, a website developer who specializes in front-end development, design, and UX principles. I recently graduated with a Diploma in Website Development and Design from Ara Institute of Canterbury, where my dedication earned me an Academic Excellence Award. My goal is simple: to continuously expand my knowledge by learning new languages and frameworks, as well as refining my existing skills. I'm eager to take on fresh projects and deliver outstanding web solutions.
